$TSLA Consumer Reports says that Tesla owners are more satisfied with their vehicles than any other brand. https://stocknews.com/news/tsla-tesla-inc-tsla-tops-consumer-repots-customer-satisfaction-survey/

links.title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) Tops Consumer Repots' Customer Satisfaction Survey
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) has positioned itself well as a very driver-centric automaker, and its electric vehicles have proven to be extremely satisfying for owners. As CNBC reports, Tesla was just named the top dog in Consumer Reports' annual customer satisfaction rankings: "Owner satisfaction is really a measurement of whether or not the car fulfilled on its promise," said Jake Fisher, director of automotive testing for Consumer Reports.

messages.body: $TSLA anyone thinking like me. 335.00 plus today?
$TSLA Tesla Saved the Day. https://interestingengineering.com/tesla-saves-major-coal-plant-by-using-power-of-massive-battery-system

links.title: Tesla Saves Major Coal Plant by Using Power of Massive Battery System
links.description: It was a race against the clock as the Tesla energy team compensated for the unexpected power trip of a major coal plant in Australia. The world-record holding Tesla lithium ion battery reacted in fractions of a second, getting online before the coal plant's backup plant even completed its startup functions.

$AMZN $TSLA $FB $NVDA $GOOG $NFLX $AAPL Senate passes spending bill, sets stage for tax cut signing https://www.cnbc.com/2017/12/21/senate-has-enough-votes-to-pass-spending-bill-sets-stage-for-tax-cut-signing.html

links.title: Senate has enough votes to pass spending bill, sets stage for tax cut signing
links.description: Aaron P. Bernstein | Reuters An emergency spending bill to fund the government through January 19 garnered enough votes in the Senate Thursday to advance to President Donald Trump's desk for signature. The Senate vote was the final hurdle facing legislation that will avert a partial government shutdown slated to begin at midnight on Friday.

messages.body: $TSLA How Tesla’s Semi will dramatically alter the trucking industry https://www.teslarati.com/tesla-semi-dramatically-alters-trucking-industry/ $AAPL $AMZN $NVDA

links.title: How Tesla's Semi will dramatically alter the trucking industry
links.description: The Tesla Semi offers something to the trucking industry that could drastically alter the entire freight moving sector. The trucking industry has seen major changes since it began roughly a century ago and has, despite the assumptions of many outsiders looking in, been one of the more technologically-advanced industries in our nation.

links.title: Tesla owner builds a bitcoin mining rig in a Model S to use free Supercharger power
links.description: The buzz around bitcoin is bigger than ever as the value of the cryptocurrency surged to $10,000 - making the entire value of the market worth over $170 billion. Now the bitcoin world is even encroaching in the Tesla world as a Model S owner built a cryptocurrency mining rig in his electric car.

links.title: Tesla Inc(NASDAQ:TSLA): Tesla, Inc. (TSLA): Neutral Rating Reiterated | StockNews.com
links.description: Tesla Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electric vehicles, electric vehicle powertrain components, and stationary energy storage systems in the United States, China, Norway, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Palo Alto, California. View our full TSLA ticker page with ratings, news, and more.
